name: @ripe-rnd/ui-components
description: Generic reusable UI components made with React

scripts.preversion: npm set registry http://pulpo.ripe.net:4873 && git checkout release
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && git checkout master && git checkout release package.json
scripts.publish_public: npm set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && git checkout release && npm publish && npm set registry http://pulpo.ripe.net:4873 && git checkout master

author: Jasper den Hertog
